DESIGN.FINISH_PREVIOUS_STEPS: You've skipped a step you need to visit first before proceeding here.
DESIGN.P_SELECT_LANGUAGES_DESC: Select the additional languages that should be available when taking your survey
DESIGN.PLEASE_SELECT_AT_LEAST_ONE_LANGUAGE: Please select at least one language
DESIGN.CLOSE_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_OPEN_DATE: Close date must be after the open date
DESIGN.I_WILL_SEND_MY_OWN_EMAILS: I will send my own emails
DESIGN.CONFIRM_LOAD_ALL_DEMOGRAPHIC_OPTIONS: Questions with large numbers of answer options may take a moment to load.
DESIGN.DO_YOU_HAVE_INDIVIDUAL_EMAIL_ADDRESSES: Do you have individual email addresses that you will use to communicate with all survey takers?
DESIGN.WILL_YOU_UPLOAD_DEMOGRAPHICS:
Will you upload demographic information for all survey takers?
(If you don't have any demographic information for some survey takers, select No)
DESIGN.DONT_WORRY_YOU_CAN: Don't worry, you can change your selections later if needed.

DESIGN_GUIDANCE_MODAL.DESIGN_GUIDANCE_NOTE: To return to these instructions click the Design Guidance icon.

EMAIL_FLOW.DESC_1: Design your survey here on Step 3 and include all statements, demographics and open-ended questions that you want to collect.
EMAIL_FLOW.DESC_2: If you have some items on your survey that only apply to specific survey takers, use the visibility feature to control which survey takers can respond to those items.
EMAIL_FLOW.DESC_3: Once complete, you’ll upload email addresses for all your survey takers on Step 4.

PRECODE_FLOW.DESC_1: Design your survey here on Step 3. Add all demographics including those you’ll upload with your EDF on Step 4. This is necessary because some survey takers will not have their demographics pre-coded so their only opportunity to provide demographic information will be on the survey.
PRECODE_FLOW.DESC_2: Once complete, upload invitees and demographic information (where available) on Step 4. Your EDF must match the demographics and answer options you created on the survey in Step 3.
PRECODE_FLOW.DESC_3: If you have some items on your survey that you only want to show to specific survey takers, return to Step 3 after uploading your EDF and configure the visibility of these items.

NO_PRECODE_FLOW.DESC_1: Design your survey here on Step 3. Leave out any demographics that you’ll upload with your EDF on Step 4.
NO_PRECODE_FLOW.DESC_2: Once complete, upload invitees and demographic information (where available) on Step 4.
NO_PRECODE_FLOW.DESC_3: If you have some items on your survey that you only want to show to specific survey takers, return to Step 3 after uploading your EDF and configure the visibility of these items.

INVITATION.BODY_PAR_1: Below is your link and log on information to an online survey to get your feedback as an employee of this organization. Please take a moment to complete this survey candidly and honestly. Your responses will be kept confidential and will not be associated with you at the individual level.
INVITATION.BODY_PAR_2: If you have any questions or trouble accessing the survey, please reply to this email.
INVITATION.BODY_PAR_3: The survey will be open until {{date | date:'MMMM dd, yyyy'}}.
INVITATION.BODY_PAR_4: For more information on what we are doing to protect confidentiality, click here.

REMINDER.BODY_PAR_1: There is still time to complete an online survey focused on capturing your feedback on our workplace culture.
REMINDER.BODY_PAR_2: Below is your link and log on information to an online survey to get your feedback as an employee of this organization. Please take a moment to complete this survey candidly and honestly. Your responses will be kept confidential and will not be associated with you at the individual level.
REMINDER.BODY_PAR_3: If you have any questions or trouble accessing the survey, please reply to this email.
REMINDER.BODY_PAR_4: The survey will be open until {{date | date:'MMMM dd, yyyy'}}.
REMINDER.BODY_PAR_5: For more information on what we are doing to protect confidentiality, click here.

DESIGN.LINK_DISABLED_TOOLTIP: You cannot send your own emails because you told us that you will be uploading some demographic information from your employee file. If you want to send your own communications you must use the survey designer to change these employee demographics to survey demographics or remove them from your survey.

DEMOGRAPHICS.RECOMMENDED_TAB_HEADING: Do you have an employee data file that you'd like to use to pre-load data cuts for your survey results?
DEMOGRAPHICS.DEMOGRAPHICS_MODAL_FILE_NOTE: Note: Upload separate templates for each demographic to be created.
DEMOGRAPHICS.SINGLE_DEMOGRAPHIC_TEMPLATE_TOOLTIP: For example, 'Who is your people manager?' or 'Please select your store number'
DEMOGRAPHICS.LINKED_DEMOGRAPHIC_TEMPLATE_TOOLTIP: For example, the options displayed to a respondent for 'In which city do you work?' would be dictated by their having provided responses for 'country' and 'state' in previous questions.
DEMOGRAPHICS.FILE_ANALYSIS_MODAL_SINGLE_TEMPLATE: Use this template to create a single demographic question that has a lot of potential answer options.
DEMOGRAPHICS.FILE_ANALYSIS_MODAL_LINKED_TEMPLATE: Use this template to create multiple, linked demographic questions, where a response to the first will determine the options presented on a second.
DEMOGRAPHICS.FILE_ANALYSIS_MODAL_REPLACE_FILE_QUESTIO: Are you sure you want to replace the current file?
DEMOGRAPHICS.NUMBER_OF_DEMOGRAPHICS: Number of Valid Demographics: {number, select, null{To Be Determined} other{#}}
DEMOGRAPHICS.FILE_ANALYSIS_DETAILS_NOTE: Note: Remove or modify all errors and then upload your file again.
DEMOGRAPHICS.TOOLTIP_CAN_NOT_DELETE_DEMO: This item can not be deleted here because you chose to include it in your EDF on Step 4.

CONFIRM_MODAL.MESSAGE_1:
Will you want to upload
any demographic information
via an employee data file?
CONFIRM_MODAL.MESSAGE_2: OK, begin adding the demographic questions you want the survey takers to see on the survey.
